00023 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Generator_CSV {
00024         
00031         protected $csv;
00032         
00039         protected $componentManager;
00040         
00047         public function __construct(F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager $componentManager) {
00048                 $this->componentManager = $componentManager;
00049                 
00050         }
00051         
00060         public function generateModuleCSV($records,$exportParams = array()) {
00061                 
00062                 //require class for $this->csv
00063                 require_once("../../../Resources/PHP/csv.lib.php");
00064                 $data = array();
00065                 
00066                 //build data array
00067                 foreach($records as $record) {
00068                         if(!is_array($record['params'])) {
00069                                 $record['params'] = array();
00070                         }
00071                         foreach($record['params'] as &$param) {
00072                                 if(is_array($param)) {
00073                                         $param = implode(";",$param);
00074                                 }
00075                         }
00076                         $data[] = $record['params'];
00077                 }
00078                 if(count($exportParams) > 0) {
00079                         foreach($data as &$params) {
00080                                 foreach($params as $key=>$value) {
00081                                         if(!in_array($key,$exportParams)) {
00082                                                 unset($params[$key]);
00083                                         }
00084                                 }
00085                         }
00086                 }
00087                 
00088                 //init csv object
00089                 $this->csv = new export2CSV(",","\n");
00090                 
00091                 //generate file
00092                 $this->csv = $this->csv->create_csv_file($data);
00093                 header("Content-type: application/eml");
00094                 header("Content-Disposition: attachment; filename=mailformplusplus.csv");
00095                 echo $this->csv;
00096                 die();
00097         }
00098         
00107         function generateFrontendCSV($params,$exportParams = array()) {
00108                 //require class for $this->csv
00109                 require_once("typo3conf/ext/mailformplusplus/Resources/PHP/csv.lib.php");
00110 
00111                 //build data
00112                 foreach($params as $key=>&$value) {
00113                         if(is_array($value)) {
00114                                 $value = implode(",",$value);
00115                         }
00116                         if(count($exportParams) > 0 && !in_array($key,$exportParams)) {
00117                                 unset($params[$key]);
00118                         }
00119                         $value = str_replace('"','""',$value);
00120                 }
00121 
00122                 //init csv object
00123                 $this->csv = new export2CSV(",","\n");
00124                 $data[0] = $params;
00125                 
00126                 //generate file
00127                 $this->csv = $this->csv->create_csv_file($data);
00128                 header("Content-type: application/eml");
00129                 header("Content-Disposition: attachment; filename=mailformplusplus.csv");
00130                 echo $this->csv;
00131                 die();
00132         }
00133 }
